E_CONFLICTING_PLUGINS.message: The plugin "{{ pluginName }}" conflicts with the following installed plugins: {{ conflictingPlugins }}

E_PLUGIN_ALREADY_INSTALLED.message: The plugin "{{ pluginName }}" is already installed

E_PLUGIN_NOT_INSTALLABLE.message: The plugin "{{ pluginName }}" is not installable in the "{{ environment }}" environment

E_CANNOT_FIND_ROUTE.message: Cannot find route "{{ identifier }}". Make sure the route exists and can be detected by static analysis, more on this on https://radonis.vercel.app/docs/compiler#static-analysis

E_MISSING_ROUTE_PARAM.message: The "{{ paramName }}" param is required to make the URL for the "{{ pattern }}" route

E_WILDCARD_ROUTES_NOT_SUPPORTED.message: Wildcard routes are currently not supported by the URL builder
